Text.Language: <ere Lazaroc v/e~taftounocf: menenca f~tou n~e~hoou: matounoc pah/t Pa[oic I/couc: v/e~tafqoybef n~je pipethwou.
Hail to Lazarus, whom He raised after four days. Raise my heart my Lord Jesus, which was killed by the evil one.
السلام للعازر الذي اقامه بعد أربعة أيام اقم قلبي ياربي يسوع الذي قتله الشرير.
